title: Premium 13.9” 2-in-1 laptop
text:
Working hand-in-hand with Dolby, we created the word's first speakers that fit into a convertible hinge via a rotating sound bar, delivering powerful immersive sound in every mode. The Yoga C930's Rotating Sound Bar with Dolby Atmos® Speaker System is truly revolutionary, as the audio sound will be just as amazing whatever mode you're in: tent, stand, tablet, or laptop.

*Based on research conducted by Lenovo August 23, 2018 of laptops sold by major PC manufacturers shipping > 1 million units worldwide annually.
description: Learn more about Yoga C930, a premium 13.9” 2-in-1 laptop with 4K display option, Dolby Atmos sound, Intel processing, and pen support.
